data.eml:eml: Pterospoda nigrescens (Hulst), a synonym of Ixala klotsi Sperry (Lepidoptera, Geometridae, Ennominae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferris, Clifford D., Schmidt, B. Christian (2011): Pterospoda nigrescens (Hulst), a synonym of Ixala klotsi Sperry (Lepidoptera, Geometridae, Ennominae). ZooKeys 149: 31-37, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.149.2343, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.149.2343
